snippet: The group’s concert at the Church of St. Mary the Virgin united sacred works by Tudor-era composers with those of the equally contemplative Arvo Pärt.
abstract: James R Oestreich reviews concert Christmas Across Centuries, performed by a cappella group Tallis Scholars, at Church of St Mary the Virgin.
lead_paragraph: The group’s concert at the Church of St. Mary the Virgin united sacred works by Tudor-era composers with those of the equally contemplative Arvo Pärt.

headline.main: Review: The Tallis Scholars, Hovering in a Meditative Sphere
headline.print_headline: Bridging the Centuries, With a Timeless Weave of Sublime Contemplation

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Church of St Mary the Virgin
